key.name: bg-image-pos
key.description: The image positioning if defined above.

key.name: bg-fill-type
key.description: The background fill type used if no image file is defined.

key.name: cycle-wallpapers
key.description: Cycle through wallpapers if more than one is defined.

key.name: cycle-timeout
key.description: Timeout before cycling to the next wallpaper (in minutes). (0.15 - 1440.0)

key.name: fade-duration
key.description: Duration of the fade from one wallpaper to the next (in seconds). (0.05 - 10.0)
